context: Spotify is the global audio streaming leader with 650M+ monthly users. The company offers music, podcasts, and audiobooks with AI DJ and personalization features driving engagement.

competitors.name: Apple Music
competitors.notes: Premium music streaming with spatial audio

competitors.name: Amazon Music
competitors.notes: Streaming integrated with Prime and Alexa ecosystem

competitors.name: YouTube Music
competitors.notes: Google streaming with music video integration

competitors.name: Audible
competitors.notes: Amazon audiobooks competing in spoken word

competitors.name: TikTok
competitors.notes: Music discovery platform affecting streaming behavior
